Landing.heroDescription: The first comprehensive Tunisian nutrition app that helps you discover local dishes, track your meals, and achieve your health goals with AI and the INNTA database.
Landing.featuresTitle: Tailored Nutrition Plans for Every Goal
Landing.featuresDescription: Personalized nutrition plans with authentic Tunisian dishes, adapted to your food culture and health objectives.
Landing.featuresCardOneDesc: INNTA database with local Tunisian dishes - couscous, brik, ojja and more, with precise nutritional values.
Landing.featuresCardTwoDesc: Set and track specific targets for weight loss, muscle gain, athletic performance, or overall wellness.
Landing.featuresCardThreeDesc: Connect with friends or coaches to share your goals, progress, and get motivation when you need it most.
Landing.aiSectionDesc: Our AI analyzes your Tunisian eating habits, uses barcode scanner and INNTA database to suggest culturally adapted nutrition plans.
Landing.aiSectionCardOneDesc: The more you use the app, the more our AI learns about your preferences and adjusts recommendations accordingly.
Landing.aiSectionCardTwoDesc: As your goals or preferences change, our AI automatically adapts your meal plans to keep you on track.
Landing.aiSectionCardThreeDesc: Scan Tunisian products and add them instantly with their precise nutritional values from the INNTA database.
Landing.dashboardTitle: Monitor Your Progress Like a Pro
Landing.dashboardDesc: Visualize your nutrition journey with our intuitive dashboard. Track calories, macros, weight trends, and more in one easy-to-use interface.
Landing.dashboardCardOneDesc: Get detailed insights on your macros, calories, hydration, weight, and more through interactive charts.
Landing.dashboardCardTwoDesc: View your progress over time with daily, weekly, and monthly reports to keep you motivated.
Landing.dashboardCardThreeDesc: Receive notifications when you're falling behind on your goals or when you're making excellent progress.
Landing.footerDescription: The all-in-one nutrition tracking and meal planning app that helps you achieve your fitness goals with AI-powered insights.

HowItWorks.title: How It Works
HowItWorks.subtitle: Manage your Tunisian nutrition in 3 simple steps with AI
HowItWorks.step1Description: Use the barcode scanner or search in our INNTA database to add your Tunisian foods with their precise nutritional values.
HowItWorks.step2Description: The AI assistant analyzes your diet, identifies trends and provides personalized recommendations.
HowItWorks.step3Description: Visualize your nutritional evolution with clear charts and achieve your health goals.

Terms.title: Terms and Conditions
Terms.intro: By using our Nutrition Plans Creator and Tracker mobile app, you agree to the following terms and conditions.
Terms.usage: The app is intended for personal use to create and monitor nutrition and meal plans. Misuse of the app is prohibited.
Terms.data: We collect data related to your nutrition preferences and usage patterns. This data is handled securely and only used to enhance your experience.
Terms.liability: We are not responsible for any health issues resulting from misinterpretation of the plans. Consult a professional before making major dietary changes.
Terms.updates: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of the app signifies your acceptance of any changes.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information when using our Nutrition Plans Creator and Tracker app.
Privacy.collection: We collect personal information such as name, age, weight, dietary preferences, and usage behavior to personalize your experience.
Privacy.usage: Your information is used to tailor meal plans, track progress, and improve app features. It is never sold or shared without your consent.
Privacy.protection: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, misuse, or disclosure.
Privacy.thirdParty: We may use third-party services for analytics or notifications. These providers are obligated to maintain confidentiality.
Privacy.changes: We may update this policy occasionally. You will be notified of any major changes, and continued use of the app implies acceptance.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.description: We'd love to hear from you. Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

ContactForm.title: Send us a message
ContactForm.description: Fill out the form below and we'll respond within 24 hours.

message.label: Message
message.helper: Please provide as much detail as possible.

Auth.meta_sign_in_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.
Auth.meta_sign_up_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.
Auth.toast_verification_code_sent: A verification code has been sent to your email
Auth.toast_session_expired: Session expired, please log in again

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Lift & Eat and our closed beta
FAQ.a1: Lift & Eat is the first comprehensive Tunisian nutrition app that uses the INNTA database to help you track your meals with authentic local dishes and precise nutritional values.
FAQ.q2: How does the closed beta work?
FAQ.a2: Our closed beta allows a limited number of users to test the app before public launch. Sign up for the waitlist to receive an early access invitation.
FAQ.a3: INNTA is the official Tunisian nutritional database containing precise nutritional values for local foods like couscous, brik, ojja and other traditional dishes.
FAQ.a4: Yes, the beta is completely free. No credit card required to join the waitlist or test the application.
FAQ.q5: Which platforms will the app be available on?
FAQ.a5: Lift & Eat will be available on iOS and Android. We plan to launch on Android first, followed by iOS shortly after.
FAQ.a6: Absolutely. We use bank-level encryption to protect your personal and nutritional data. Your information is never shared with third parties.

Reassurance.freeDesc: The beta is completely free. No credit card required.
Reassurance.secureDesc: Bank-level encryption to protect your personal information.
Reassurance.limitedDesc: Exclusive access for a limited number of Tunisian testers.
Reassurance.earlyDesc: Be among the first to discover the app before the general public.

Waitlist.title: Join the beta
Waitlist.subtitle: Leave your email to get early access
Waitlist.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
Waitlist.consent: I agree to be contacted by email about the beta and marketing updates.
Waitlist.consentError: Please accept the consent to join the waitlist.
Waitlist.rateLimit: Too many attempts. Please try again later.
Waitlist.disposableError: Disposable email addresses are not accepted.
